# soundName

**Instance Property**

The name of the sound to play when the alarm triggers.

## Declaration

```swift
var soundName: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is the name of a system sound that can be used with the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AppKit/NSSound/init(named:)] class method to create an `NSSound` object. Assigning this property a value will set the [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKAlarm/emailAddress] and [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKAlarm/url] properties to `nil`.

## Triggering Alarm Actions

- **EKAlarmType**: A value that specifies what type of action occurs when the alarm triggers.
- **type**: The type of action to trigger when the alarm fires.
- **emailAddress**: The recipient of an email to send when the alarm triggers.
